title: V.N.  Venkatakrishnan's Web Site - Home Page
contents:
V.N. (Venkat) Venkatakrishnan  Home    “ The teacher who walks in the shadow of the temple, among his followers, gives not of his wisdom but rather of his faith and his lovingness. If he is indeed wise he does not bid you enter the house of his wisdom, but rather leads you to the threshold of your own mind. ”  :- Kahlil Gibran in The Prophet          Greetings!!  Affiliations   Professor of Computer
          Science and University Scholar. Associate Dean for Research and Graduate Studies, UIC Engineering  Interim Director of Research, Discovery Partners Institute      Research Interests    My research areas broadly span topics in Computer Systems Security, with use of ideas from compilers, operating systems and formal methods for defending cyber attacks.My complete publication list available here .  New! Digital Contact Tracing ConTraIL project! Whitepaper here: Privacy-preserving Secure Digital Contact Tracing.   My CV is available here . Research Support My research is sponsored by grants from NSF, US Department of Defense, US Department of Energy.   Recent and Ongoing Professional Activities  Program Committees   2020: ACM CCS 2020. 2019: ACM CCS 2019. 2018: WWW'18 (Security, Privacy Track) 2017: NDSS'17 . 2016: NDSS'16 , AsiaCCS'16  2015: NDSS'15 , SecureComm'15  2014: Oakland'14 , CNS'14 , SKM'14  2013: Oakland'13 , W2SP'13 , ESORICS'13 , NDSS'13  2012: ICISS'12 (PC Chair), Oakland'12 , W2SP'12 , PST'12  2011: ICISS'11 , ACSAC'11 , Oakland'11 , W2SP'11 , ESSoS'11    Conference Organization   Workshop Chair CCS'11, CCS'12 . Local Arrangements. CCS'09,CCS'10,CCS'11 . Chicago, IL. Tutorial chair. ICISS'10  Workshop Chair. Fourth Midwest Security Workshop. Oct 2007.     Education I graduated with a Ph.D in Computer Science in December 2004, from Stony Brook University (formerly, SUNY @ StonyBrook). My advisor was R. Sekar .        Students I've been fortunate to work with a group of outstanding students and postdocs!  Current Student Advisees   Vijay Sai Prasanth Kommini (M.S.)   Current Postdocs    Birhanu Mekuria   Rigel Gjomemo    Past    Mike Ter Louw (Ph.D) (now at LGS innovations)  Prithvi Bisht (Ph.D) (now at Adobe) Kalpana Gondi (Ph.D) (co-advised with Prof. Prasad Sistla) (now at Amazon) Tim Hinrichs (post-doc) (co-advise with Lenore Zuck) (now at VMWare) Phu H. Phung (post-doc) (now Asst. Professor of Computer Science at Univ of Dayton) Birhanu Eshete (post-doc) (now Asst. Professor of Computer Science at Univ of Michigan, Dearborn) Maliheh Monshizadeh (Ph.D) Abeer Alhuzali (Ph.D)(now Asst. Professor of Computer Science at King AbdulAziz University) Sadegh Momemi (Ph.D) (Software Engineer, Google Enterprise Security)    Teaching  Fall 2015: CS487 : Building Secure Computer Systems  Fall 2015 office hours: MW 11.a.m.-noon in SEO 1131.   Fun stuff I am a member of the following Chicago-area organizations:  Lincoln Park Zoo  The Morton Arboretum      Home  Research  Teaching  Publications  Vita   Security Lab  RITES@UIC  Personal  Contact Me    News  Chicago has a lot of nice restaurants. See where I have eaten lately! Resources for biking in Chicago.          Content ©Copyright V.N.  Venkatakrishnan
